title: Master Unit, Beautiful Area (Close to BART)
posting_body: - If you are interested, please send over a text message telling a bit about yourself, name, what you do, etc.
show contact info
-  One large Master Unit with a private individual bathroom/shower, private entrance, private exit, and parking.
It is roughly 185 square feet and includes a beautiful backyard/patio area for relaxation or work.
- Includes free high speed internet access, PGE, and all utilities (no extra charge).
- Room is available furnished (desk, bed, refrigerator, microwave) or unfurnished, depending on your preference.
- Includes free access card to newly built large community swimming pool with showers and hall space, as well as a large community park.
- Conveniently located between Concord BART Station and North Concord BART Station.
Very calm and nice community, never had any problems in the many years that we have been living here.
It is a short 1.2 mile walk from the North Concord BART Station, as well as 1.4 miles to the Concord BART Station, and close to Concord bus stations.
BART is a 4-minute drive away, 10-12 minute bike ride, or 25 minute walk.
- 3-4 minutes away from all major freeway/highway options (CA-24, I-680, CA-4), with easy commute options to San Francisco, Oakland/Berkeley, Fremont/South Bay, Marin/North Bay.
3.5 miles from DVC Campus with buses running right into Diablo Valley College (DVC) campus.
- Good for professionals, as we are located very close to multiple freeway entrances and a short walk to Downtown Concord.
Deposit - $1,000
Last Month's Rent $1,100
- Total For Move-In - $3,200
- Month-To-Month.
Unit is available now.
- Renting to individual only.
No guests allowed.
